personal.name: Alae Laaziri
personal.title: Software & Automation Engineer
personal.status: Authorized to work in the U.S. through 2028 (renewable) · No sponsorship required

about.description: Incoming Graduate Student at Johns Hopkins University (MS in Cybersecurity) and a precision-focused Software Engineer. I specialize in building high-assurance distributed systems, automating complex enterprise workflows, and crafting secure digital infrastructure. My work bridges the gap between theoretical security models and production-grade software solutions.

experience.title: Software & Automation Engineer
description: Architected the AlaeAutomates platform, reducing manual document processing time by 99% through intelligent PDF parsing and fuzzy matching algorithms.
Engineered secure automated payment workflows enabling seamless reconciliation between credit card processors and check systems.
Designed a company-wide SharePoint architecture to modernize digital collaboration and secure document retention.
Developed custom Excel automation tools with complex heuristic matching for financial data reconciliation.

secondary.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: FriendsGoTogether
projects.shortDescription: Production-grade real-time rideshare platform for university students.
projects.longDescription: A production-deployed, full-stack rideshare platform engineered to connect university students. Features **real-time WebSocket communication**, geographic search with **19,000+ cities**, and **enterprise-level security**.

projects.title: AlaeAutomates Platform
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise business automation suite for financial document processing.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive business automation platform featuring separated **Flask API** and **Express.js frontend**. Handles intelligent **PDF parsing**, invoice organization, and automated **Excel reconciliation**.

projects.title: Distributed Systems Protocol Suite
projects.shortDescription: Advanced implementation of MapReduce, Raft Consensus, and Snapshot algorithms.
projects.longDescription: Complete implementation of fundamental distributed computing algorithms in **Go**. Includes fault-tolerant **MapReduce**, **Raft leader election/log replication**, and **Chandy-Lamport** distributed snapshots.

projects.title: Enterprise Expense Tracker
projects.shortDescription: Real-time financial management with government-grade security.
projects.longDescription: Secure expense tracking platform featuring **AES-256 encryption**, real-time **WebSocket updates**, and comprehensive **audit logging**. Built for enterprise financial oversight.

projects.title: Smart Laundry System
projects.shortDescription: IoT-enabled laundry management PWA with NFC integration.
projects.longDescription: Dual-platform solution addressing dormitory resource scheduling. Features **real-time machine status tracking**, automated notifications, and **Web NFC API** integration for instant interaction.

projects.title: Enterprise Document Automation Suite
projects.shortDescription: Secure desktop automation tool for specialized shipping workflows.
projects.longDescription: Cross-platform desktop application automating complex shipping documentation. Features intelligent **Secure Shipping Container** management, dynamic form generation, and **Verified Entity ID** validation.

projects.title: Fabulous Nature Social
projects.shortDescription: Agile-developed React social platform for photography enthusiasts.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive social media platform built with **React 18**. Features complex **state management**, real-time interactions, and a nature-focused design system.

projects.title: Custom Web Server Foundation
projects.shortDescription: Zero-framework HTTP/WebSocket server built from scratch.
projects.longDescription: Pure **Python** implementation of **HTTP** and **WebSocket protocols**. Demonstrates deep understanding of network programming, socket handling, and **RFC compliance** without external frameworks.

projects.title: Federal Budget Analysis DB
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade PostgreSQL system for government transparency.
projects.longDescription: Advanced relational database solution analyzing 5 years of U.S. Treasury data. Features complex **9-table schema**, **ACID compliance**, and sophisticated **PL/pgSQL triggers** for fraud prevention.
